home.discovery_card_subtitle: What if you let chance do the rest...

auth.sign_in_description: Enter your email to receive a verification code
auth.create_account_description: A verification code will be sent immediately to validate your email address
auth.terms_notice: By clicking Continue, you accept the terms of use and privacy policy
auth.recover_description: Enter your email to receive a reset link

splash.subtitle: What if you let chance do the rest ?

voice.title: Secret Voice
voice.secret_description:
This voice message is mandatory, but will remain secret and anonymous.

It will only be revealed to your interlocutor if mutual Feeling reaches 50%.

This is the opportunity to let your voice be guessed, without revealing everything too quickly.

surprise.modal_subtitle:
Congratulations, you're almost at 100%!
You are about to discover the person you're talking to.

Unfortunately, the free version stops here.

Upgrade to SeaYou PREMIUM to continue the adventure and lift the mystery.
surprise.q1: If you could describe a perfect atmosphere, what would it be?
surprise.q2: If I whisper something in your ear, would you prefer it to be sweet… or clearly not innocent?
surprise.q3: What can a partner do to leave you totally speechless?
surprise.banner_required: Answer at least one question to proceed.

welcome.title: Welcome to SeaYou!
welcome.subtitle: The first 3.0 dating place, where souls choose each other before the physical.
welcome.line1: Here, your first encounters will be 100% anonymous.
welcome.line2: You will discover each other progressively, through conversations.
welcome.line3: Each message will be sent like a bottle thrown into the sea, anonymously and securely, only to people matching your criteria.
welcome.line4: When you receive a reply, a conversation starts between you, allowing you to increase your Feeling through your exchanges, and the more your Feeling rises, the more you unlock exclusive revelations…

home.title: Welcome to SeaYou
home.line1: Anonymous encounters begin here. Send bottles according to matching criteria.
home.line2: Responses open the conversation. Your Feeling increases with each exchange.
home.line3: A higher Feeling unlocks secrets like Citation (25%) and Voice (50%).

signup.title: Start anonymously
signup.message: SeaYou is first and foremost anonymous. Explore, then reveal only when you decide.

face_required.title: Face photo required
face_required.message: Add a confidential face photo to activate the final reveal at 100% mutual.

photo.title: Profile photo
photo.line1: This photo of your real face is mandatory but will remain confidential.
photo.line2: It will only be revealed if you obtain 100% mutual Feeling with your interlocutor, and will appear only if authorized in the category "Secret Souls", and no other information about your identity will be disclosed.
photo.line3: You will then be able to add 5 additional photos of your choice.

quote.title: Secret quote
quote.line1: This message is mandatory, but will remain secret and anonymous.
quote.line2: It will only be revealed to your interlocutor if mutual Feeling reaches 25%.
quote.line3: Be mysterious, funny, deep… or all at once.

audio.title: Secret voice message
audio.line1: This voice message is mandatory, but will remain secret and anonymous.
audio.line2: It will only be revealed to your interlocutor if mutual Feeling reaches 50%.
audio.line3: This is the opportunity to let your voice be guessed, without revealing everything too quickly.

incomplete.title: Impossible to create the account.
incomplete.message:
To finalize registration, the user must complete the following 3 elements:

• A profile photo
• A written quote
• An audio message

gate.title: Premium Space
gate.message: This area is reserved for PREMIUM members.

classique.bottles_locked: New received bottles inaccessible until you reply to your own send

premium.desires_access: Free access to Door of Desires
premium.direct_message: Ability to send direct messages to SeaYou members in Secret Souls and Door of Desires

daily.title: Daily limit reached
daily.message:
You have reached the limit of 3 sends per day.
To continue creating connections, upgrade to SeaYou Premium.

weekly.title: Limit reached
weekly.message:
You have reached the maximum number of messages allowed this week.

Discover our message packs
Pricing will be sent later

secret_souls.title: Secret Souls
secret_souls.no_contact: View only. No direct contact from this section.

popup.title: Secret Souls
popup.description:
Enter a confidential space where you will find photos, quotes, and voice messages from SeaYou members, always 100% anonymous.

Each content is an intimate imprint, meant to be felt before being understood.

With SeaYou PREMIUM, you can directly contact the authors of quotes and voice messages to initiate authentic, subtle, and respectful exchanges.

main_photo_warning.title: Warning
main_photo_warning.message:
Make sure to put a photo of your face (AI-verified).
This one will be revealed when you reach 100% Feeling with someone.

secret_souls.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?

chamber.title: Chamber of Secrets
chamber.subtitle: Anonymized fantasies from SeaYou members
chamber.non_premium_bubble: Fantasies are reserved for PREMIUM members.
chamber.upgrade_elite: Upgrade to Elite to send anonymous messages

fantasy.title: Your Fantasies
fantasy.subtitle: Share your desires anonymously
fantasy.description: Add at least one fantasy to continue. These will be visible to certain users, but remain 100% anonymous until both of you reach 100% mutual feeling.

gate.title: Door of Desires
gate.description:
Here you will find all the secrets and unspoken fantasies of SeaYou members.

Content appears randomly, under total anonymity.

You can send a message directly to the owner of the secret or fantasy, in a 100% anonymous framework for both sides.

This space is exclusively reserved for SeaYou PREMIUM members.

reminder.title: Enable location
reminder.message: Do not forget to enable location and choose the radius within which you want to send messages.
